backend/main.mo: Motoko canister exposing daily inspirational messages with filters, plus blob-storage mixin for background music uploads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping music-related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of core frontend files including MainPage, music tracks config, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark-mode color definitions for the legacy color system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps MainPage with ThemeProvider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks calling backend endpoints for daily message, motto, categories, and all messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH calming palette and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders App.
frontend/src/music/tracks.ts: Defines available upbeat music tracks with ids, file paths, titles, and attribution.
frontend/src/pages/MainPage.tsx: Main React page handling daily message loading and an audio player with play/pause, volume, and track selection. It initializes and manages an HTMLAudioElement and renders the main UI layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, radius, and plugins like typography and container queries. Defines theme customizations and scans project files for class usage.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's current state, features, requests, and metadata for the Positive Vibes app. Used for tracking feature versions and pending work.
